verses.verse: In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6242>month,<s%> in the twenty - <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>Word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> now to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7604><s%> 'Who is left among you who <S%H7200>saw<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> in its <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3519>glory?<s%> How do you <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H5869>now?<s%> Isn't it in your eyes as <S%H3644>nothing?<s%>

Yet now be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H2388><s%> 'Be strong, <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> all you <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'and work, for I am with <S%H5002>you,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> with you when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5975>lived<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3372>you.<s%> 'Don't be afraid.'

For this is what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H259><s%> 'Yet once, it is a little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the dry <S%H2724>land;<s%>

and I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> all <S%H1471>nations.<s%> The precious things of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2091>mine,<s%> and the gold is <S%H5002>mine,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H314><s%> 'The latter <S%H3519>glory<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%> will be greater <S%H1419>than<s%> the <S%H7223>former,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> <S%H4725><s%> 'and in this place will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>"

In the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8147>month,<s%> in the second <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>Word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> now the <S%H3548>priests<s%> concerning the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H376><s%> 'If someone <S%H5375>carries<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>meat<s%> in the <S%H3671>fold<s%> of his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and with his <S%H3671>fold<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H5138>stew,<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or any <S%H3978>food,<s%> will it become <S%H6942>holy?<s%>'" The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "No."

Then <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If one who is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a dead <S%H5315>body<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> any of <S%H2930>these,<s%> will it be unclean?" The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "It will be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>"

Then <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H5971><s%>"'So is this people, and so is this <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H4639><s%> 'and so is every work of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%> That which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> there is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H7760>Now,<s%> please consider from this <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H4605>backward,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> was <S%H7760>laid<s%> on a <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Through all that <S%H935>time,<s%> when one came to a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H6235>measures,<s%> there were only ten. When one <S%H935>came<s%> to the wine <S%H3342>vat<s%> to draw <S%H2834>out<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> <S%H6333>there<s%> were only <S%H6242>twenty.<s%>

I <S%H5221>struck<s%> you with <S%H7711>blight,<s%> <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%> in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> yet you <S%H5002>didn't<s%> turn to me,' says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7760><s%> 'Consider, <S%H3117>please,<s%> from this day and <S%H4605>backward,<s%> from the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H3117>month,<s%> since the day that the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1964>temple<s%> was <S%H7760>laid,<s%> consider it.

Is the <S%H2233>seed<s%> yet in the <S%H4035>barn?<s%> <S%H1612>Yes,<s%> the vine, the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> and the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5375>haven't<s%> brought forth. From this <S%H3117>day<s%> will I bless <S%H1288>you.<s%>'"

The <S%H1697>Word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came the <S%H8145>second<s%> time to <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7493><s%> 'I will shake the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2392>strength<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots,<s%> and those who <S%H7392>ride<s%> in <S%H5483>them.<s%> The horses and their <S%H7392>riders<s%> will come <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> will I <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2216>you,<s%> Zerubbabel, my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7760><s%> 'and will make you as a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>"
